author: Beth Dominic
comment: This app use to be my favorite. But for some reason with a recent update my live wallpaper for this app doesn't work. Why can't I customize this like I use to be able to. I have paid so much for gomo app team on several apps.

author: E. I. Bennett
comment: I FOLLOWED THE INSTRUCTIONS BELOW AND IT DIDN'T WORK. NOW WHAT? I PURCHASED FULL USE OF THE WHOLE APP, MARCH 4, 2016. IT WAS $18.99 THEN. I HAD BOUGHT PRO VERSION BEFORE THAT FEBRUARY 21, 2016. I had to reinstall the app and it wants me to pay for it again. I had the super vip. Now what?

reply.author: GOMO Go
reply.content:
Dear E. I. Bennett
You can try this way.
1. login the gmail account that purchased go weather pro .
2. open go weather- click the diamond- choose premium package 
3. go through the process of payment. No need to pay, just for Google verification.
Any problems please contact us.
Best regards

author: Carl King
comment: Garbage. In order to get the entire benefits/range (10 day forecast etc.) you either have to pay or download other apps you don't want. I just want weather. Many other options for free and no hassles out there. Uninstalling!

author: Weavre Cooper
comment: UNINSTALLED! After they added DU Quick Charge that tried to replace my lock screen with ads and take over other settings. Never was an awesome app, and this update turned it into malware. NO! I don't need that headache.

reply.author: GOMO Go
reply.content:
Dear Weavre Cooper,
Sorry for the disturb. Ads push will be controlled in lowest frequency. Hope you understand and support us. We will try our best to provide you high quality weather service.

Best regards

author: Amber Leigh
comment: It used to work great. It technically still does however I can no longer change my home screen wallpaper. Every time I try its blank where all my wallpapers should be. I like changing it for every holiday or season. But at this time I can't. Please update this app soon!

reply.author: GOMO Go
reply.content:
Dear user,

 To solve this, You can do as the following list: click the menu button   in the top left corner - settings - Unit settings - Date unit - choose yyyy/mm/dd. After this, you can refresh your widget again.Any problems, please contact us. We will fix it soon.

Best regards

author: Estelle Ashley
comment: Only worked correctly every other time I opened it. Very annoying. Uninstalled.

author: Altaf V
comment: Location is Hanoi, Vietnam. In one day usage i found it's not accurate. AccuWeather shows 21° weather in Hanoi & go weather shows 18° and feel like 19° which is not accurate (i refreshed both). Uninstalling it.

reply.author: GOMO Go
reply.content:
Dear Altaf V,
We are so sorry for the issue. We have received your feedback and we will solve it as soon as possible. Thanks for your patience.Any problem contact us.

Best regards

author: Gary Bond
comment: Everytime I use the forecast screen it is blank and will not update so I have to go and delete the apps data & cache to get it to work.

reply.author: GOMO Go
reply.content:
Dear Gary Bond
So sorry for the problem. You can exit and then enter the app for several times to solve the problem, hope it will help you. If the issue still, please explain specific information and send a screenshot to us.Thanks for your support. Email:goweatherexfeedback@gmail.com
Best regards.

author: FKnFREAK
comment: Nice, customizable, lots of options, and I love having a timer/ stopwatch, but some "free stuff" isn't really free, still great app.!

author: Karen Morris
comment: e frequently new widgets added new dynamic backgrounds are rare. Many users love to use the dynamic backgrounds as home screen wallpaper .Add more dynamic backgrounds there are tons of widgets. Paid user.

reply.author: GOMO Go
reply.content: Dear user, sorry for the issue, can you provide your country and city to us? if you have any question, please contact with us: goweatherexfeedback@gmail.com

reply.author: GOMO Go
reply.content:
Dear Joe Leong
So sorry for the problem. The problem is still investigated and we will solve it in the next version as soon as possible. Thanks for your patience and support. Any problem contact us.

Best regards.

author: Waleed Mohammed
comment: Eats battery! Radar doesnt load. no weather map representation. no color representations on graphs. Expensive.

reply.author: GOMO Go
reply.content:
Dear Waleed Mohammed,
Could you tell us how much percent of battery did GO Weather consume?  Please check your phone setting and contact us: goweatherexfeedback@gmail.com.
To get more information,if possible, please send us the screenshot about the problem of no map and no color representations,thanks! 
Looking forward to your reply.

Best regards
